#308 0' 6.8"
111.33 lbs. 		Armor Bird Pokémon A Pokémon that has a body and wings of steel. People in the past used feathers fallen from Skarmory to make swords and knives.

Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Keen Eye 2 Prevents other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
1 Sturdy 16 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
18 Battle Armor 60 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
36 Steelworker 31 Powers up Steel-type moves.
54 Tough Claws 78 Powers up moves that make direct contact.
72 Carbonize 77 Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
90 Weak Armor 12 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
100 Full Metal Body 32 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 06 Keen Eye 2 Prevents other Pokémon from lowering this Pokémon's accuracy.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 0 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 12 Sturdy 16 It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
Disc 13 Cloud Nine 31 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Disc 15 Lightning Rod 18 The Pokémon draws in and neutralises Electric-type moves, boosting its Sp. Atk.
Disc 17 Wind Rider 64 Blocks wind moves. Attack is boosted from Tailwind or when hit by a wind move.
Disc 20 Sand Force 52 Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type moves in a sandstorm.
Disc 21 Rock Head 14 Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
Disc 25 Levitate 12 By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
Disc 31 Gale Wings 79 Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is full.
Disc 42 Sand Stream 102 The Pokémon summons a sandstorm when it enters a battle.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Aerilate 77 Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Aerodynamic 48 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Blustery Winds.
Air Lock 31 Eliminates the effects of weather.
Armor Tail 11 It makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
Battle Armor 60 Hard armor protects the Pokémon from critical hits.
Big Pecks 5 Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering effects.
Bulletproof 14 Protects the Pokémon from some ball and bomb moves.
Carbonize 77 Normal-type moves become Steel-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Convection 46 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it's hit by an attack.
Defeatist -17 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Early Bird 1 The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
Emergency Exit -29 The Pokémon, sensing danger, switches out when its HP becomes half or less.
Full Metal Body 32 Prevents other Pokémon's moves or Abilities from lowering the Pokémon's stats.
Heavy Metal 1 Doubles the Pokémon's weight.
Imperious -92 This Pokémon sometimes refuses to obey its Trainer.
Klutz -24 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Light Metal 1 Halves the Pokémon's weight.
Limber 11 Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
Mirror Armor 37 Bounces back only the stat-lowering effects that the Pokémon receives.
Moxie 66 The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
Pressure System 102 The Pokémon generates blustery winds when it enters battle.
Primal Prancer 56 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat on Primal Terrain.
Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Sand Rush 52 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a sandstorm.
Sand Veil 3 Boosts the Pokémon's evasiveness in a sandstorm.
Sharpness 32 Boosts the power of slicing moves.
Shrapnel Surge 84 Turns the ground into Shrapnel Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Slow Start -94 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -13 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Steel Skin 9 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Shrapnel Terrain.
Steelworker 31 Powers up Steel-type moves.
Steely Spirit 31 Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.
Super Luck 34 The Pokémon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios of its moves are boosted.
Tough Claws 78 Powers up moves that make direct contact.
Truant -67 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Armor 12 Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
Wind Power 11 When hit by a wind move, the Pokémon becomes Charged up.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled
